description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. The barriers of space have finally been broken down. GLITNIR, the ultimate space station, can take us to the farthest corners of the Universe. When dark forces rise to crush this dream, it is your task to defend GLITNIR from total destruction.  This is a "3D Tower Defense" style game.
description.short: The barriers of space have finally been broken down. GLITNIR, the ultimate space station, can take us to the farthest corners of the Universe. When dark forces rise to crush this dream, it is your task to defend GLITNIR from total destruction.  This is a "3D Tower Defense" style game.
